org.biolegato.database

Class DBPCD

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.biolegato.database.DBPCD
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DBPCDConstants

    public class DBPCD
extends java.lang.Object
implements DBPCDConstants
    A class used to parse PCD schema files into BioLegato.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • parseSchema

        public final DBSchema parseSchema(java.io.File parent,
                   boolean norecurse)
                           throws ParseException
        Parses a PCD database schema.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent path of the PCD database file - this is used for DB referencing
        norecurse - if true, recursion through reference fields and the like will be skipped (this prevents infinite recursion when parsing reference fields)
        Returns:
        the parsed schema object
        Throws:
        ParseException

      • parseField

        public final DBField parseField(java.lang.String table,
                 KeyableField key,
                 java.io.File parent,
                 boolean norecurse)
                         throws ParseException
        Parses a single PCD database field.
        Parameters:
        table - the name of the table that the field belongs to
        key - the name of the primary key withing table that the field belongs to
        parent - the parent path of the PCD database file - this is used for DB referencing
        norecurse - if true, recursion through reference fields and the like will be skipped (this prevents infinite recursion when parsing reference fields)
        Returns:
        the parsed field object
        Throws:
        ParseException

      • parseKeyableField

        public final KeyableField parseKeyableField()
                                     throws ParseException
        Parses a single Keyable (i.e. may be used as a database key) PCD database field.
        Returns:
        the parsed field object
        Throws:
        ParseException
